pullRequest.title: Fix download license archive (Admin > Import & Export)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please provide a summary of your changes here.

Which issue is this pull request belonging to and how is it solving it? (Refer to issue here)
Did you add or update any new dependencies that are required for your change?


Issue:
#906
Suggest Reviewer

You can suggest reviewers here with an @mention.

How To Test?

Admin > Import & Export > Download License Archive

Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

commit.message:
Fix: 'Download license archive' button in Admin>'import & Export' page is not working #906

Signed-off-by: Nguyen Phuong Nam <nam1.nguyenphuong@toshiba.co.jp>

nodes.bodyText: As the same method is already present in LicenseAdminPortlet. May be we should consider to move it to a common place like Sw360Portlet
